column5: Thanks Everyone. She looks beautiful up on the wall in my office. I get to see it every (work) day! LOL no Brett...all the 47s would not get me to trade the memory of this big girl!!!Quote: Originally Posted by dhottleDid you get a weight on her before release? Beautiful mount.No, we didnt weigh her. Measurement was spot on; outfitter doesnt give a 1/4". Button 52"Quote: Originally Posted by tmifshrmnWhat outfitter was it? Which area were you fishing?Midnight Sun Trophy Pike Adventures www.mstpa.com This was in mid-July 2022. My full report is on the main WC page
Scott- That is a great looking mount and what a trophy to remember. What an epic trip for you and great trip report.

Went north from Oklahoma to hunt in the UP last week. Had a great time seeing old friends. Shot over to Nisswa MN to pick up my 52" Alaska Northern pike replica from Mike at Fibertech. When I walked into Mike's shop I saw her up on the wall...HOLY &$TI does this girl look awesome. The head is perfectly matched to the body. Mike did a better job than I could imagine. Thanks for the recommendation here on WC. Please send Mike your business; he was great to work with. On the drive home I stopped in Des Moines for the night and snuggled up to my girl LOL. One cool sidenote is when I was kid back in the late 70s, our summer vacations were in the Brainerd area - it was memorable to be back there picking up my dream Pike.http://www.fibertechproductions.com/
That is one wicked pike for sure.Beautifull job as well.The spots are very well done.
What a hog, what dis you catch her on??? Replica looks great!!

Awesome fish and mount. Mike at FIbertech did an amazing job on my 45Â” pike mount back in 2015. It still looks brand new. Mike has a vast array of molds for all types of species. If you can't find a mold there, you won't find it anywhere else most likely. When she is dusty, you can take it outside and rinse it off too LOL Enjoy the replica. PjShorthorn

Thanks Rich...Caught on Red & White Johnson's sliver minnow (big one - 1.5 oz?). She hit about 8 ft from the boat. Never had a chance to mess up the strike; it was like she appeared and had it in her mouth all in one motion. Fishing thick cabbage making short pitch-casts to keep the weeds off the lure. Captain and I both saw the take and we were speechless...Great fight and Release. Truly magical.
Truly a great fish and mount! Congrats!
Can I trade you my 5 47s for your one 52? Deal? Great fish! Brett
Did you get a weight on her before release? Beautiful mount.
What outfitter was it? Which area were you fishing?
